title: Europe Needs Some Space From China and Trump. Its Firms Don’t.
summary_full: Germany’s chancellor seeks to reduce Europe’s reliance on China and the United States. He speaks with a bluntness that few business leaders share.
summary_public: Germany’s chancellor seeks to reduce Europe’s reliance on China and the United States. He speaks with a bluntness that few business leaders share.

DE.label: positive
DE.evidence: Germany’s chancellor seeks to reduce Europe’s reliance on China and US.
